definition: Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州

sentences.english: Dice tomatoes and shred basil leaves, set aside.
sentences.chinese: 番茄切粒，紫蘇葉切絲備用。

sentences.english: Ancient China beautiful women loved to drink it for keeping their health and beautiful skin.
sentences.chinese: 古代中國美女喜愛飲用紫蘇烏梅汁來保持健康與皮膚。

sentences.english: In Perilla campus, you will find the answer.
sentences.chinese: 在紫蘇園裏，你可以找到答案。

sentences.english: Blend chopped basil, oil, and vinegar in mini processor until most of basil is pureed.
sentences.chinese: 將紫蘇，橄欖油和白醋放進攪拌機中攪打成泥。

sentences.english: Grilled Coconut Chicken with Lemon Basil.
Pale yellow oily liquid, With Perilla -specific odor, Taste of soft.
sentences.chinese: 淺黃色油狀液體，具有紫蘇特有的氣味，滋味柔和。

sentences.english: The product is very delicious and nutritious because of adding Perilla seed.
sentences.chinese: 同時，由於紫蘇子的加入提高了產品的營養價值。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a method for the determination of perillyl alcohol in the extract of Perilla frutescens L.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立紫蘇提取液中紫蘇醇的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To set up a method for the determination of perillyl alcohol in the extract of Perilla frutescens L.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立紫蘇提取液中紫蘇醇的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Clean button mushrooms with a damp cloth, slice. Finely chop Basil.
sentences.chinese: 蘑菇用溼布抹乾淨後切片，紫蘇切條。

definition: vermicelli made from mung bean starch etc
Yilan county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
